title: BRIEF-MBN Corp Says NCIB Will Commence On September 23, 2019 And Will Terminate On September 22, 2020
text:
BRIEF-MBN Corp Says NCIB Will Commence On September 23, 2019 And Will Terminate On September 22, 2020

Stock Markets 4 minutes ago (Sep 16, 2019 09:00)

© Reuters. BRIEF-MBN Corp Says NCIB Will Commence On September 23, 2019 And Will Terminate On September 22, 2020 Sept 16 (Reuters) - MBN Corp : * MBN CORP - NCIB WILL COMMENCE ON SEPTEMBER 23, 2019 AND WILL TERMINATE ON SEPTEMBER 22, 2020 * MBN CORP - FUND MAY, DURING 12 MONTH PERIOD COMMENCING SEPTEMBER 23, 2019 PURCHASE ON TSX UP TO 354,128 EQUITY SHARES * MBN CORP - FUND MAY, DURING 12 MONTH PERIOD COMMENCING SEPTEMBER 23, 2019 PURCHASE MORE THAN 92,601 EQUITY SHARES

BRIEF-MBN Corp Says NCIB Will Commence On September 23, 2019 And Will Terminate On September 22, 2020
description: BRIEF-MBN Corp Says NCIB Will Commence On September 23, 2019 And Will Terminate On September 22, 2020
